node.quote: Every helmet, bulletproof vest and night vision device save the lives of Ukrainian soldiers. Thus, we must continue to support our defenders. Thanks so much to everyone from the crypto community for supporting Ukraine!
node.position: Vice Prime Minister â€“ Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine
node.name: Mykhailo Fedorov

node.quote: Aid For Ukraine shows how the global crypto community and the traditional financial system can work together. Crypto donations to the DAO are stored and governed on-chain, then transferred to FTX, a centralized exchange, to be sold for fiat USD sent via SWIFT to the Ukranian government.
node.name: Anatoly Yakovenko

node.quote:
ICON Foundation is joining global community efforts by pledging 1 million ICX towards aid and relief for the Ukrainian people. 

I hope that our technology and community can make a small contribution in this time of need.
node.name: Min Kim

node.quote: Today, crypto is playing a significant role in Ukraine's defense. Huge thanks to the crypto community for this unprecedented support of Ukraine and its defense of the principles of democracy and freedom in face of the war waged by the Russian Federation.
node.position: the Deputy Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine
node.name: Alex Bornyakov

node.quote: This is not just the war against centralized regime, this is the birth of blockchain as a backbone of global security.
node.position: founder of KUNA Exchange, President of Blockchain Association of Ukraine
node.name: Mike Chobanian

node.quote: Incredibly excited and humbled to be working with the Ministry of Digital Transformation of Ukraine, Everstake, and others to support crypto donations to Ukraine.
node.position: the founder and CEO of FTX
node.name: Sam Bankman-Fried
